attributes.action: We would like national recognition for Captain Tom Moore
attributes.additional_details:
Captain Moore has, to this moment, raised over £12million for the NHS during this Corona Virus crisis. 
We thank him for bringing the country together in these difficult times and for his service to the country in WW2
attributes.background: Please ask Her Majesty the Queen to consider bestowing honour on 100 year old, Captain Tom Moore for his charitable works and for inspiring our wonderful nation in our time of need.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
